alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:28PM CDT until June 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN TARRANT AND DALLAS COUNTIES... At 827 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located over Mansfield and across parts of Dallas County. These storms are slowly moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Arlington, Garland, Irving, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Carrollton, Richardson, Flower Mound, Mansfield, Rowlett, Euless, Desoto, Bedford, Grapevine, Cedar Hill, Wylie, Coppell, Duncanville and Burleson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
